amendment.description: To ensure that eligible entities that have only recently begun collecting data on child human trafficking are not precluded from being awarded certain grants.

vote.text: Amendment SA 299 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 299 proposed by Senator Cornyn for Senator Hoeven. (consideration: CR S2333-2337; text as modified: CR S2334) To ensure that eligible entities that have only recently begun collecting data on child human trafficking are not precluded from being awarded certain grants.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 299 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 299 proposed by Senator Cornyn for Senator Hoeven.
